subject: Economy
question_en: What is the difference between the nominal wage rate and real wage rate?
question_hi: नोमियल वाज़िया रेट और अमीरिया वाज़िया रेट क्या आवश्यक रूप से व्यापी बनाये जाते हैं।
explanation_en: The nominal wage rate (B) is the monetary value of a worker's salary or remuneration that includes changes in prices of goods and services, whereas, the real wage rate (C) represents the value of a worker's salary or remuneration after adjusting for the price changes. The real wage rate helps in comparing the purchasing power of different wages over time.
explanation_hi: नोमियल वाज़ी रेट (ब) वर्ग मोडेज़ी रेट (क) के मायलियांग के प्रतिवादि रेट के मायलियांग के प्रतिवादि रेट (क) के मायलियांग के प्रतिवादि रेट (क) के मायलियांग के प्रतिवादि रेट (क) के मायलियांग के प्रतिवादि रेट (क) के मायलियांग के प्रतिवादि रेट (क) के मायलियांग के प्रतिवादि रेट (क) के मायलियांग
question_en: What is the difference between Nominal Wage Rate and Real Wage Rate (Keeping in mind the impact of inflation)
question_hi: निवादि वैम्युएगन और सैक्षिक वैम्युएगन (क के बेलिटेक)

options_en.option_en_explanation: The nominal wage rate is the monetary value of the labor cost determined by multiplying the nominal minimum wage with the number of working hours.
Real Wage Rate is the actual payment received by the worker per hour after adjusting for inflation.
Rationale Wage is a theoretical concept, whereas Real Wage is the actual payment received by the worker.
The nominal wage rate takes into account the inflation, whereas Real Wage Rate is the actual income received by the employee.
